00021 #include "Effect.h"

00023 class wxStaticText;
00024 
00025 class WaveTrack;
00026 
00027 class EffectEcho:public Effect {
00028 
00029  public:
00030 
00031    EffectEcho();
00032 
00033    virtual wxString GetEffectName() {
00034       return wxString(_("Echo..."));
00035    }
00036 
00037    virtual std::set<wxString> GetEffectCategories() {
00038       std::set<wxString> result;
00039       result.insert(wxT("http://lv2plug.in/ns/lv2core#DelayPlugin"));
00040       return result;
00041    }
00042 
00043    virtual wxString GetEffectIdentifier() {
00044       return wxString(wxT("Echo"));
00045    }
00046 
00047    virtual wxString GetEffectAction() {
00048       return wxString(_("Performing Echo"));
00049    }
00050    
00051    // Useful only after PromptUser values have been set. 
00052    virtual wxString GetEffectDescription(); 
00053 
00054    virtual bool PromptUser();
00055    virtual bool TransferParameters( Shuttle & shuttle );
00056    
00057    virtual bool Process();
00058 
00059  private:
00060    bool ProcessOne(int count, WaveTrack * t,
00061                    sampleCount start, sampleCount len);
00062  
00063    float delay;
00064    float decay;
00065 
00066 friend class EchoDialog;
00067 };

00082    // handlers
